This caused an intermittent failure in the Team tests. Tod, do you think this is a bug in the progress dialog?
Looks that way - I think this is a case of the dialog still listening to the monitor even though it is closed
I would like this fixed for M7
Fixed for build >20070327. We were missing an alreadyClosed check for this case.
*** Bug 171698 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
